divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend and I were sitting on our back porch in fuquay varina NC when I spotted a glowing orb. The orb hovered in one place for about an hour while it changed many different colors and appeared to change shape. After hovering for an hour the UFO took off behind a tree line a lot faster than a plane could go. We took 3 pretty cool videos and I have almost twenty pictures. All of my pictures and videos are time stamped because they were taken with my cell phone
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fuquay-Varina
There was one other sighting in Fuquay-Varina on or around October 26th 2013
Summary: with boyfriend on back porch and spotyed a glowing ord it changed color and hovered for about an hour before taking off
